channels.label: Can subscribe
channels.description: Allow users to subscribe to Channels.

channels.label: Show hidden channel toggle
channels.description: Allow user to view hidden channels

device_settings.label: Allow open in
device_settings.description: Allow users to open content in other applications.

device_settings.label: Can copy text in viewers
device_settings.description: Allow users to use iOS copy-paste functionality to copy text in file viewer.

device_settings.label: Device browser restrictions
device_settings.description: Apply browsing restrictions by allowing websites to be blacklisted or whitelisted.

device_settings.label: Download subscribed content only
device_settings.description: Only content which the user has subscribed to will be downloaded.

device_settings.label: Require Android file encryption
device_settings.description: Encrypt content if using an Android device.

device_settings.label: Inactivity lock timeout
device_settings.description: Set a period of time before the user's device is locked.

features.label: Logout
features.description: Allow users to log out of bigtincan hub.

features.label: My Files
features.description: Enable bigtincan hub My Files feature.

features.label: Show BTC annotation tool
features.description: Show the annotation option in the UI

features.label: Web tabs
features.description: Enable bigtincan hub Web tabs feature.

features.label: Home screen tab
features.description: Home screen tab to be shown when logging in

features.label: Landing page V5
features.description: Landing page to be shown after logging in

integrations.label: Cloud Storage
integrations.description: Allow users to use Cloud Storage

integrations.label: CRM Integration
integrations.description: Select to enable CRM Integration for this bundle

integrations.label: Enable JavaScript bridge
integrations.description: Enable to allow developers to use JavaScript bridge API.

publishing.label: Author delete only
publishing.description: Enable author-only delete so that only the author of the Story can delete it.

publishing.label: Author edit only
publishing.description: Enable author-only edit so that only the author of the Story can edit it.

publishing.label: Can alias
publishing.description: Allow users to create story aliases.

publishing.label: Can comment
publishing.description: Allow users to comment on Stories.

publishing.label: Can copy
publishing.description: Allow users to copy Stories to other Channels.

publishing.label: Can copy description
publishing.description: Allow users to copy Story descriptions using default iOS copy-paste functionality.

publishing.label: Can create Quickfile
publishing.description: Allow users to create Quick file Stories. Quick file Stories act as links to files, which can be opened direct from the Story.

publishing.label: Can create Quickform
publishing.description: Allow users to create Quickform Stories. Quickform Stories act as links to forms, which can be opened directly from the Story.

publishing.label: Can create Quicklink
publishing.description: Allow users to create Quick link Stories. This allows users to open a link direct from the Story.

publishing.label: Can edit options
publishing.description: Allow users to adjust Story options.

publishing.label: Can flag
publishing.description: Allow users to flag a story.

publishing.label: Can like / rate
publishing.description: Allow users to like / rate Stories.

publishing.label: Can sort
publishing.description: Allow users to use the sort feature which orders Stories in a specified way.

publishing.label: Can subscribe
publishing.description: Allow users to subscribe to Stories.

publishing.label: Web file
publishing.description: Allow users to attach a link to a webpage as a HTML file in Stories.

story_options.label: Annotations
story_options.description: Allow users to use annotations for content.

story_options.label: Events
story_options.description: Allow users to add Events to Stories.

story_options.label: Expiry
story_options.description: Allow users to set expiry dates for Stories. The expiry date means Stories are no longer available after the specified date.

story_options.label: Featured dates
story_options.description: Allow users to set the featured dates for a story

story_options.label: Location constraints
story_options.description: Allow users to specify a specific area in which their Story can be accessed.

story_options.label: Notifications
story_options.description: Allow users to set notifications for when Stories have been updated, changed or edited.

story_options.label: Priority
story_options.description: Allow users to specify the priority of a story.

story_options.label: Protected
story_options.description: Allow users to set a password for their Stories so that it can only by viewed once a user password has been inputted.

story_options.label: Publish date
story_options.description: Allow users to set the publish date for a story

story_options.label: Tags
story_options.description: Allow users to add Tags to Stories.

story_sharing.label: Attach Optional Files
story_sharing.description: Set whether optional files should be attached to a story share by default

story_sharing.label: Device
story_sharing.description: Allow users to share Stories through email.

story_sharing.label: Share w/ Audit
story_sharing.description: Allow users to share Stories through HubShare.

general.label: Can create personal (Legacy)
general.description: Allow users to create personal Channels.

general.label: Can delete personal  (Legacy)
general.description: Allow users to delete personal Channels.

general.label: Enable thumbnails (Legacy)
general.description: Allow users to download and display thumbnails for content.

features.label: Landing page
features.description: Landing page to be shown after logging in

home_screen.label: Home Screen Unversioned
home_screen.description: select to set homescreen for devices which doesnt specify a bridge version(legacy)

home_screen.label: Home Screen Version 1
home_screen.description: select to set homescreen for bridge version 1.0

home_screen.label: Home Screen Version 2
home_screen.description: select to set homescreen for bridge version 2.0

my_files_legacy.label: Can create local documents
my_files_legacy.description: Allow users to create new documents which are stored on their device.

my_files_legacy.label: Can create local presentations
my_files_legacy.description: Allow users to create new presentations which are stored on their device.

my_files_legacy.label: Can create local spreadsheets
my_files_legacy.description: Allow users to create new spreadsheets which are stored on their device.

remote_repositories_legacy.label: Box
remote_repositories_legacy.description: Allow users to access their Box account through bigtincan hub.

remote_repositories_legacy.label: Dropbox
remote_repositories_legacy.description: Allow users to access their Dropbox account through bigtincan hub.

remote_repositories_legacy.label: Google Drive
remote_repositories_legacy.description: Allow users to access their Google Drive account through bigtincan hub.

remote_repositories_legacy.label: SkyDrive
remote_repositories_legacy.description: Allow users to access their SkyDrive account through bigtincan hub.

stories.label: Can favourite (Legacy)
stories.description: Allow users to mark a Story as a favorite.

stories.label: Can move
stories.description: Allow users to move Stories to other Channels.

story_options.label: File URL
story_options.description: Allow users to attach URLs for files from remote repositories.

ui.label: Show subscribed content only
ui.description: Tick to show this option so users can enable or disable it.

ui.label: Splash (Legacy)
ui.description: Enable custom splash screen on launch.
